fn.p: Disclaimer: The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

Financial support: This work was supported by the Wellcome Trust of Great Britain, the Institute of Research for Development (IRD), Aix-Marseille University, and by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme EVAg under grant agreement number 653316.

Authors’ addresses: Manivanh Vongsouvath and Malee Seephonelee, Lao-Oxford-Mahosot Hospital-Wellcome Trust Research Unit (LOMWRU), Microbiology Laboratory, Mahosot Hospital, Vientiane, Lao PDR, E-mails: manivanh@tropmedres.ac and malee@tropmedres.ac. Tehmina Bharucha, Institute of Glycobiology, Department of Biochemistry, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom, E-mail: tehminabharucha@googlemail.com. Xavier de Lamballerie and Audrey Dubot-Pérès, Unité des Virus Émergents (UVE: Aix-Marseille Univ-IRD 190-Inserm 1207-IHU Méditerranée Infection), Marseille, France, E-mails: xavier.de-lamballerie@univ-amu.fr and audrey@tropmedres.ac. Paul N. Newton, Nuffield Department of Medicine, Centre for Tropical Medicine and Global Health, University of Oxford, Churchill Hospital, Oxford, United Kingdom, E-mail: paul@tropmedres.ac.
These authors contributed equally to this work.
